SEARCH
Package PDFjet.NET

Interface IDrawable

All Known Implementing Classes:
Barcode, Barcode2D, Box, CalendarMonth, Chart, CheckBox, CompositeTextLine, FileAttachment, Form, Image, Line, Path, Point, QRCode, RadioButton, Text, TextBox, TextColumn, TextFrame, TextLine, Title
public interface IDrawable
Interface that is required for components that can be drawn on a PDF page as part of Optional Content Group.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    float[]
    DrawOn(Page page)
    Draw the component implementing this interface on the PDF page.
    void
    SetPosition(float x, float y)
    Set the x and y coordinates of the drawable object

  • Method Details

    • DrawOn

      float[] DrawOn(Page page) throws Exception
      Draw the component implementing this interface on the PDF page.
      Parameters:
      page - the page to draw on.
      Returns:
      x and y coordinates of the bottom right corner of this component.
      Throws:
      Exception - if the draw method did not succeed.

    • SetPosition

      void SetPosition(float x, float y)
      Set the x and y coordinates of the drawable object
      Parameters:
      x - the x location
      y - the y location
